**surveydown** is a flexible, open-source platform for making surveys with [{{< fa brands r-project >}}]({{< var url_rproject >}}){target="_blank"}, [Quarto]({{< var url_quarto >}}){target="_blank"}, [Shiny](https://shiny.posit.co/){target="_blank"}, and [Supabase]({{< var url_supabase >}}){target="_blank"}. The accompanying [{{< fa brands r-project >}} package](https://pkg.surveydown.org/){target="_blank"} is still in development, but you can already use it to create surveys!
